title: Retrieve Last Element from a List
description:
LIST_RETRIEVE_LAST passes the last item from a list and deletes the correï¿¾sponding item in the list. The list consists of Strings (elements) that begin
with the separation character SEP.
name: LIST_RETRIEVE_LAST

input.name: SEP
input.description: The byte value used as a separator in the list.

output.name: LIST_RETRIEVE_LAST
output.description: The substring extracted from the list after the last occurrence of the separator.

in/out.name: LIST
in/out.description: The input-output list of characters from which the last element is to be retrieved. This list will be modified to terminate at the last separator.

return_value.description: Returns the last element in the list found after the last separator.
